mapper.insert: insert into board_auction(board_num, board_title, board_content, board_id, board_nickname, board_cost, board_see) values( BOARD_AUCTION_SEQ.NEXTVAL, #{board_title}, #{board_content}, #{board_id}, #{board_nickname},#{board_cost},#{board_see} )
mapper.select: select * from board_auction left join board_file_auction on board_auction.board_num=board_file_auction.board_num where board_auction.board_id=#{friend_id} order by board_auction.board_date desc

select * from board_auction left join board_file_auction on board_auction.board_num=board_file_auction.board_num where board_auction.board_category=#{transaction_name} order by board_auction.board_date desc
select * from board_auction left join board_file_auction on board_auction.board_num=board_file.board_num order by board_auction.board_date desc
select * from board_auction order by board_auction.board_date desc
select*from board_auction left join board_file_auction on board_auction.board_num=board_file_auction.board_num where board_auction.board_num=#{board_num}
mapper.update: update board_auction set board_title=#{board_title}, board_content=#{board_content}, board_cost=#{board_cost}, board_see=#{board_see}, board_category=#{board_category} where board_num=#{board_num}

choose.when: update board_auction set board_replies=board_replies+1 where board_num=#{board_num}
update board_auction set board_replies=board_replies-1 where board_num=#{board_num}
